title: kali kAlam enru nin
sahitya:
kali kAlam enru nin karuNaiyai maraittAyO kaNNA kaNNA kaNNA maNivaNNA


anupallavi

  valiya hiraNiyanai vanjakak-kamsanai mamatai dashamukhanai vadaitta para sUranE


caraNam    nAttikak-kiNDalum Attika suraNDalum nalam keDum pOrum narakam koDum tuyarum
tIrttinda ulaginaik-kAttal un kaDan anrO dinamaNiyE bhaktar mana maNiyE sharaN
